articles.author: BBC News
articles.description:
Police appeal for information relating to three babies abandoned by the same parents shortly after birth in east London.

A reward of £20,000 is also being offered by Crimestoppers.
articles.title: £20,000 reward offered as police search for parents of three abandoned babies

articles.description: Photographers describe the photo as 'serious', 'ominous' and a 'message picture'.

articles.description: The Supreme Court earlier upheld a law that would ban the video app in the US unless its Chinese parent-company sells it.
articles.title: TikTok says it will 'go dark' if US government does not intervene

articles.description: David Tudor was banned from the Church of England for life in October over sexual abuse allegations.
